channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Black Hat USA 2023 Conference Theatre Sessions Presented by Microsoft Security
item.description: Now in its 26th year, Black Hat USA takes place August 5-10, 2023 at Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas, bringing together security professionals for the latest in information security research, development, and trends. Microsoft Security is pleased to have a presence at Black Hat, with exciting sessions, product demos and meetings at our booth, and a customer happy hour—all designed to inform and engage attendees with the latest thought leadership, trends, and news related to threat protection. We’re also very excited to have a mini-theatre right in our booth to share the latest thought leadership, tr...
